Protocols/GenericSystemPolylineMarker.ht.name: polyline
Protocols/GenericSystemPolylineMarker.ht.abstract: The polyline that should be displayed on the map.

Protocols/GenericSelectableSystemPointMa.name: active
Protocols/GenericSelectableSystemPointMa.abstract: Updates the visual properties to indicate active status (ie. updates search pin to be gray when inactive).

Protocols/GenericSelectableSystemPointMa.name: initWithMarkerType(_:)
Protocols/GenericSelectableSystemPointMa.abstract: Returns a marker whose visual properties have been defined by a house style.

Protocols/GenericSystemPointMarker.html#.name: initWithMarkerType(_:)
Protocols/GenericSystemPointMarker.html#.abstract: Returns a marker whose visual properties have been defined by a house style.

Protocols/GenericPolygonMarker.html#/s:v.name: polygon
Protocols/GenericPolygonMarker.html#/s:v.abstract: The polygon that should be displayed on the map.

Protocols/GenericPolygonMarker.html#/s:v.name: order
Protocols/GenericPolygonMarker.html#/s:v.abstract: The drawing order of the polygon relative to other polylines and polygons. Higher values will be drawn above lower values. Default is 1000.

Protocols/GenericPolylineMarker.html#/s:.name: polyline
Protocols/GenericPolylineMarker.html#/s:.abstract: The polyline that should be displayed on the map.

Protocols/GenericPolylineMarker.html#/s:.name: strokeWidth
Protocols/GenericPolylineMarker.html#/s:.abstract: The width of the stroke to draw the polyline.

Protocols/GenericPolylineMarker.html#/s:.name: order
Protocols/GenericPolylineMarker.html#/s:.abstract: The drawing order of the polyline relative to other polylines and polygons. Higher values will be drawn above lower values. Default is 1000.

Protocols/GenericPointMarker.html#/s:vP9.name: point
Protocols/GenericPointMarker.html#/s:vP9.abstract: The coordinates that the marker should be placed at on the map.

Protocols/GenericPointMarker.html#/s:FP9.name: setPointEased(_:seconds:easeType:)
Protocols/GenericPointMarker.html#/s:FP9.abstract: Animates the marker from its current coordinates to the ones given.

Protocols/GenericGeometricMarker.html#/s.name: interactive
Protocols/GenericGeometricMarker.html#/s.abstract: If the marker is interactive, it is able to be selected and delegates can receive callbacks for these events. Default value is true.

Protocols/GenericGeometricMarker.html#/s.name: backgroundColor
Protocols/GenericGeometricMarker.html#/s.abstract: Sets the marker background color. Default value is white.

Protocols/GenericMarker.html#/s:vP9Mapze.name: tgMarker
Protocols/GenericMarker.html#/s:vP9Mapze.abstract: The underlying Tangram marker object. Use this only for advanced cases where features of the Marker class aren’t supported.

Protocols/GenericMarker.html#/s:vP9Mapze.name: drawOrder
Protocols/GenericMarker.html#/s:vP9Mapze.abstract: The marker draw order relative to other markers. Note that higher values are drawn above lower ones.

Protocols/LocationManagerDelegate.html#/.name: authorizationDidSucceed()
Protocols/LocationManagerDelegate.html#/.abstract: The user authorized the application to receive location updates

Protocols/LocationManagerDelegate.html#/.name: authorizationDenied()
Protocols/LocationManagerDelegate.html#/.abstract: The user denied the application from receiving location updates.

Protocols/LocationManagerDelegate.html#/.name: authorizationRestricted()
Protocols/LocationManagerDelegate.html#/.abstract: The user is restricted from authorizing the application for location updates. This is normally due to parental control lockout.

Protocols/MapTileLoadDelegate.html#/s:FP.name: mapControllerDidCompleteLoading(_:)
Protocols/MapTileLoadDelegate.html#/s:FP.abstract: Informs the delegate the map has completed loading tile data and is displaying the map.

Protocols/MapMarkerSelectDelegate.html#/.name: mapController(_:didSelectMarker:atScreenPosition:)
Protocols/MapMarkerSelectDelegate.html#/.abstract: Informs the delegate a marker of the map was just selected

Protocols/MapLabelSelectDelegate.html#/s.name: mapController(_:didSelectLabel:atScreenPosition:)
Protocols/MapLabelSelectDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Informs the delegate a label of the map was just selected

Protocols/MapFeatureSelectDelegate.html#.name: mapController(_:didSelectFeature:atScreenPosition:)
Protocols/MapFeatureSelectDelegate.html#.abstract: Informs the delegate a feature of the map was just selected.

Protocols/MapShoveGestureDelegate.html#/.name: mapController(_:didShoveMap:)
Protocols/MapShoveGestureDelegate.html#/.abstract: Informs the delegate the map just shoved.

Protocols/MapRotateGestureDelegate.html#.name: mapController(_:didRotateMap:)
Protocols/MapRotateGestureDelegate.html#.abstract: Informs the delegate the map just rotated.

Protocols/MapPinchGestureDelegate.html#/.name: mapController(_:didPinchMap:)
Protocols/MapPinchGestureDelegate.html#/.abstract: Informs the delegate the map just zoomed via a pinch gesture.

Protocols/MapPanGestureDelegate.html#/s:.name: mapController(_:didPanMap:)
Protocols/MapPanGestureDelegate.html#/s:.abstract: Informs the delegate the map just panned.

Protocols/MapLongPressGestureDelegate.ht.name: mapController(_:recognizer:shouldRecognizeLongPressGesture:)
Protocols/MapLongPressGestureDelegate.ht.abstract: Asks the delegate if the map should recognize this long press gesture and perform default functionality (which is nothing, currently).

Protocols/MapLongPressGestureDelegate.ht.name: mapController(_:recognizer:didRecognizeLongPressGesture:)
Protocols/MapLongPressGestureDelegate.ht.abstract: Informs the delegate the map recognized a long press gesture.

Protocols/MapDoubleTapGestureDelegate.ht.name: mapController(_:recognizer:shouldRecognizeDoubleTapGesture:)
Protocols/MapDoubleTapGestureDelegate.ht.abstract: Asks the delegate if the map should recognize this double tap and perform default functionality (which is nothing, currently).

Protocols/MapDoubleTapGestureDelegate.ht.name: mapController(_:recognizer:didRecognizeDoubleTapGesture:)
Protocols/MapDoubleTapGestureDelegate.ht.abstract: Informs the delegate the map recognized a double tap gesture.

Protocols/MapSingleTapGestureDelegate.ht.name: mapController(_:recognizer:shouldRecognizeSingleTapGesture:)
Protocols/MapSingleTapGestureDelegate.ht.abstract: Asks the delegate if the map should recognize this single tap and perform default functionality (which is nothing, currently).

Protocols/MapSingleTapGestureDelegate.ht.name: mapController(_:recognizer:didRecognizeSingleTapGesture:)
Protocols/MapSingleTapGestureDelegate.ht.abstract: Informs the delegate the map recognized a single tap gesture.

Protocols.html#/s:P9MapzenSDK10StyleShee.name: StyleSheet
Protocols.html#/s:P9MapzenSDK10StyleShee.abstract: This is the foundational code for custom stylesheet and theme support. This area will likely be the focus of updates & changes over the next several releases, so we would recommend avoiding implementing your own custom stylesheet classes until we have further vetted this implementation. Documentation will be written once we’ve solidified on the protocol requirements and implementation details.

Protocols.html#/s:P9MapzenSDK23LocationM.name: LocationManagerProtocol
Protocols.html#/s:P9MapzenSDK23LocationM.abstract: Protocol for LocationManager’s api so that actual implementation can be switched out in testing contexts.

Extensions/PeliasResponse.html#/s:FE9Map.abstract: Produces an array of PeliasMapkitAnnotations based off the response from Pelias servers.

Classes/PointMarker.html#/s:vC9MapzenSDK.abstract: Sets the size of a point marker. Does nothing when a polyline or polygon is set.

Classes/Marker.html#/s:vC9MapzenSDK6Mark.abstract: The marker draw order relative to other markers. Note that higher values are drawn above lower ones.

Classes/SearchRect.html#/s:FC9MapzenSDK1.name: init(minLatLong:maxLatLong:)
Classes/SearchRect.html#/s:FC9MapzenSDK1.abstract: Initialize a rectangle with given min and max points.

Classes/MapzenSearch.html#/s:vC9MapzenSD.name: autocompleteTimeDelay
Classes/MapzenSearch.html#/s:vC9MapzenSD.abstract: Delay in seconds that the manager should wait between keystrokes to fire a new autocomplete request. Default is 0.3

Classes/MapzenSearch.html#/s:vC9MapzenSD.name: baseUrl
Classes/MapzenSearch.html#/s:vC9MapzenSD.abstract: Base url to execute requests against. Default value is https://search.mapzen.com.

Classes/MapzenSearch.html#/s:vC9MapzenSD.name: urlQueryItems
Classes/MapzenSearch.html#/s:vC9MapzenSD.abstract: The query items that should be applied to every request (such as an api key).

Classes/MapzenSearch.html#/s:FC9MapzenSD.name: search(_:)
Classes/MapzenSearch.html#/s:FC9MapzenSD.abstract: Perform an asyncronous search request given parameters defined by the search config. Returns the queued operation.

Classes/MapzenSearch.html#/s:FC9MapzenSD.name: reverseGeocode(_:)
Classes/MapzenSearch.html#/s:FC9MapzenSD.abstract: Perform an asyncronous reverse geocode request given parameters defined by the config. Returns the queued operation.

Classes/MapzenSearch.html#/s:FC9MapzenSD.name: autocompleteQuery(_:)
Classes/MapzenSearch.html#/s:FC9MapzenSD.abstract: Perform an asyncronous autocomplete request given parameters defined by the config. Returns the queued operation.

Classes/MapzenSearch.html#/s:FC9MapzenSD.name: placeQuery(_:)
Classes/MapzenSearch.html#/s:FC9MapzenSD.abstract: Perform an asyncronous place request given parameters defined by the search config. Returns the queued operation.

Classes/PeliasMapkitAnnotation.html#/s:F.name: setTarget(target:action:)
Classes/PeliasMapkitAnnotation.html#/s:F.abstract: Sets a target for the selector which will be invoked when the annotation is clicked.

Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:vC9Mapze.name: delegate
Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:vC9Mapze.abstract: The delegate to receive the location authorization and status callbacks

Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC9Mapze.name: requestAlwaysAuthorization()
Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC9Mapze.abstract: Request the user give the application location access at all times.

Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC9Mapze.name: requestWhenInUseAuthorization()
Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC9Mapze.abstract: Request the user give the application location access only when in the foreground.

Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC9Mapze.name: isInUseAuthorized()
Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC9Mapze.abstract: Asks the location subsystem if we’re currently authorized for location access while in foreground.

Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC9Mapze.name: isAlwaysAuthorized()
Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC9Mapze.abstract: Asks the location subsystem if we’re currently authorized for location access at all times.

Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC9Mapze.name: refreshCurrentLocation()
Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC9Mapze.abstract: Refreshes the stored current location and also returns it to the caller

Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC9Mapze.name: requestLocation()
Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC9Mapze.abstract: The difference between this function and refreshCurrentLocation() is requestLocation() immediately returns and will serve the location via the delegate

Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC9Mapze.name: startUpdatingLocation()
Classes/LocationManager.html#/s:FC9Mapze.abstract: Starts the location manager callbacks for location updates

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:vC9M.name: cameraType
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:vC9M.abstract: The camera type we want to use. Defaults to whatever is set in the style sheet.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:vC9M.name: position
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:vC9M.abstract: The current position of the map in longitude / latitude.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:vC9M.name: rotation
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:vC9M.abstract: The current rotation, in radians from north.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:vC9M.name: showTransitOverlay
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:vC9M.abstract: Show or hide the transit route overlay. Not intended for use at the same time as the bike overlay. Fine to use with the walking network.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:vC9M.name: showBikeOverlay
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:vC9M.abstract: Show or hide the bike route overlay. Not intended for use at the same time as the transit overlay.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:vC9M.name: showWalkingPathOverlay
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:vC9M.abstract: Show or hide the walking network. Not intended for use at the same time as the bike overlay. Fine for use with the transit overlay

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:vC9M.name: shoveEnabled
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:vC9M.abstract: Enables / Disables shove gestures on the map.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: init()
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Default initializer. Sets up the find me button and initializes the TGMapViewController as part of startup.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: init(coder:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Default required initializer for storyboard creation.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: init(nibName:bundle:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Default required initializer for nib-based creation.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:vC9M.name: mapView
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:vC9M.abstract: Direct access to the underlying TGMapViewController’s view.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:vC9M.name: tabBarOffset
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:vC9M.abstract: The height of our enclosing tab bar controller’s tab bar if it is translucent.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: animate(toPosition:withDuration:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Animates the map to a particular position using the default easing type (Cubic).

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: animate(toPosition:withDuration:with:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Animates the map to a particular position using the provided easing type.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: animate(toZoomLevel:withDuration:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Animates the map to a particular zoom level using the default easing type (Cubic).

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: animate(toZoomLevel:withDuration:with:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Animates the map to a particular zoom level using the provided easing type.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: animate(toRotation:withDuration:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Animates the map to rotate using the default easing type (Cubic).

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: animate(toRotation:withDuration:with:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Animates the map to rotate using the provided easing type.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: animate(toTilt:withDuration:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Animates the map to tilt using the default easing type (Cubic).

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: animate(toTilt:withDuration:with:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Animates the map to tile using the provided easing type.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: addMarker(_:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Adds a marker to the map. A marker can only be added to one map at a time.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: removeMarker(_:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Removes a marker from the map.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: markerRemoveAll()
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Removes all existing markers on the map.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: loadStyle(_:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Loads a map style synchronously on the main thread. Use the async methods instead of these in production apps.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: loadStyle(_:locale:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Loads a map style synchronously on the main thread. Use the async methods instead of these in production apps.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: loadStyle(_:sceneUpdates:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Loads a map style synchronously on the main thread. Use the async methods instead of these in production apps.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: loadStyle(_:locale:sceneUpdates:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Loads a map style synchronously on the main thread. Use the async methods instead of these in production apps.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: loadStyleAsync(_:onStyleLoaded:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Loads the map style asynchronously. Recommended for production apps. If you have scene updates to apply, either use the other version of this method that allows you to pass in scene updates during load, or wait until onSceneLoaded is called to apply those updates.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: loadStyleAsync(_:locale:onStyleLoaded:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Loads the map style asynchronously. Recommended for production apps. If you have scene updates to apply, either use the other version of this method that allows you to pass in scene updates during load, or wait until onSceneLoaded is called to apply those updates.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: loadStyleAsync(_:sceneUpdates:onStyleLoaded:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Loads the map style asynchronously. Recommended for production apps. If you have scene updates to apply, either pass in the scene updates at the initial call, or wait until onSceneLoaded is called to apply those updates.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: loadStyleAsync(_:locale:sceneUpdates:onStyleLoaded:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Loads the map style asynchronously. Recommended for production apps. If you have scene updates to apply, either pass in the scene updates at the initial call, or wait until onSceneLoaded is called to apply those updates.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: loadStyleSheet(_:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Loads a map style synchronously on the main thread. Use the async methods instead of these in production apps.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: loadStyleSheet(_:locale:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Loads a map style synchronously on the main thread. Use the async methods instead of these in production apps.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: loadStyleSheetAsync(_:onStyleLoaded:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Loads the map style asynchronously. Recommended for production apps. Uses the system’s current locale.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: loadStyleSheetAsync(_:locale:onStyleLoaded:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Loads the map style asynchronously. Recommended for production apps.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: updateLocale(_:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Sets the locale used to determine the map’s language.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: queueSceneUpdate(_:withValue:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Queue a scene update using a yaml string path. It’s recommended to use the other version of this that uses the TGSceneUpdate objects. Try to queue as many scene updates as you can in one pass as each applySceneUpdates() call can require a re-parse of the yaml and a re-render of the map. It is required to call applySceneUpdates() to activate the updated that have been enqueued.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: queue(_:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Queue an array of scene updates. Try to queue as many scene updates as you can in one pass as each applySceneUpdates() call can require a re-parse of the yaml and a re-render of the map. It is required to call applySceneUpdates() to activate the updated that have been enqueued.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: lngLat(toScreenPosition:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Convenience function that converts TGGeoPoints to UIKit screen coordinates.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: screenPosition(toLngLat:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Convenience function that converts UIKit screen coordinates to a lat/long pair.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: resetCameraOnCurrentLocation(_:zoomLevel:animationDuration:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Resets the camera on the current location, as well as the zoom and tilt.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: showFindMeButon(_:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Handles state for the find me button.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: showCurrentLocation(_:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Shows or hides the current location of the device. This starts the location request process and will prompt the user the first time its called.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: enableLocationLayer(_:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Enables / Disables the entire current location layer.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: add(_:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Adds an array of annotations to the map.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: remove(_:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Removes a single annotation

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: removeAnnotations()
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Removes all currents annotations.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: removeMapAnnotations()
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Removes all currents annotations.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: display(_:)
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Displays a routing result on the map. This currently only supports single start and endpoint routes. If there’s an existing route it will be silently replaced.

Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.name: removeRoute()
Classes/MZMapViewController.html#/s:FC9M.abstract: Removes the route from the map

Classes/SearchResponse.html#/s:vC9Mapzen.name: response
Classes/SearchResponse.html#/s:vC9Mapzen.abstract: The url response if the request completed successfully.

Classes/SearchResponse.html#/s:vC9Mapzen.name: error
Classes/SearchResponse.html#/s:vC9Mapzen.abstract: The error if an error occured executing the operation.

Classes/RoutingController.html#/s:ZFC9Ma.name: controller()
Classes/RoutingController.html#/s:ZFC9Ma.abstract: Static function that vends a properly configured routing controller.

Classes/RoutingController.html#/s:FC9Map.name: updateLocale(_:)
Classes/RoutingController.html#/s:FC9Map.abstract: Set the locale to determine the language the route’s directions are in. The default value is Locale.current

Classes/MapzenManager.html#/s:ZvC9Mapzen.name: sharedManager
Classes/MapzenManager.html#/s:ZvC9Mapzen.abstract: The single object to be used for all access

Classes/MapzenManager.html#/s:vC9MapzenS.name: apiKey
Classes/MapzenManager.html#/s:vC9MapzenS.abstract: The Mapzen API key. If this is not set, exceptions will get raised by the various objects in use.

Classes/SearchConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenSD.name: searchText
Classes/SearchConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenSD.abstract: Text to search for within components of the location. This value is required.

Classes/SearchConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenSD.name: numberOfResults
Classes/SearchConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenSD.abstract: The number of results to return. This value is optional and defaults to 10.

Classes/SearchConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenSD.name: boundaryCountry
Classes/SearchConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenSD.abstract: The boundary country (in ISO-3166 alpha-2 or alpha-3 format) to limit results by. This value is optional and defaults to not restricting results to any country.

Classes/SearchConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenSD.name: boundaryRect
Classes/SearchConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenSD.abstract: The rectangular boundary to limit results to. This value is optional and defaults to none.

Classes/SearchConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenSD.name: boundaryCircle
Classes/SearchConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenSD.abstract: The circular boundary to limit results to. This value is optional and defaults to none.

Classes/SearchConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenSD.name: focusPoint
Classes/SearchConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenSD.abstract: The point to order results by where results closer to this value are returned higher in the list. This value is optional and defaults to none.

Classes/SearchConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenSD.name: dataSources
Classes/SearchConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenSD.abstract: Sources to fetch data from. This value is optional and defaults to all sources.

Classes/SearchConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenSD.name: layers
Classes/SearchConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenSD.abstract: Layers to fetch sources from. This value is optional and defaults to all sources.

Classes/SearchConfig.html#/s:FC9MapzenSD.name: init(searchText:completionHandler:)
Classes/SearchConfig.html#/s:FC9MapzenSD.abstract: Initialize a search config with all the required parameters. This value will get converted into the appropriate query item.

Classes/ReverseConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenS.name: point
Classes/ReverseConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenS.abstract: The point to reverse geocode. This value is required.

Classes/ReverseConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenS.name: numberOfResults
Classes/ReverseConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenS.abstract: The number of results to return. This value is optional and will default to 10 if no value is defined.

Classes/ReverseConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenS.name: boundaryCountry
Classes/ReverseConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenS.abstract: The boundary country (in ISO-3166 alpha-2 or alpha-3 format) to limit results by. This value is optional and defaults to not restricting results to any country.

Classes/ReverseConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenS.name: dataSources
Classes/ReverseConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenS.abstract: Sources to fetch data from. This value is optional and defaults to all sources.

Classes/ReverseConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenS.name: layers
Classes/ReverseConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenS.abstract: Layers to fetch sources from. This value is optional and defaults to all sources.

Classes/ReverseConfig.html#/s:FC9MapzenS.name: init(point:completionHandler:)
Classes/ReverseConfig.html#/s:FC9MapzenS.abstract: Initialize a reverse config with all the required parameters.

Classes/PlaceConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenSDK.name: gids
Classes/PlaceConfig.html#/s:vC9MapzenSDK.abstract: The place gids to fetch info for.

Classes/PlaceConfig.html#/s:FC9MapzenSDK.name: init(gids:completionHandler:)
Classes/PlaceConfig.html#/s:FC9MapzenSDK.abstract: Initialize a place config with all the required parameters.

Classes/AutocompleteConfig.html#/s:vC9Ma.name: searchText
Classes/AutocompleteConfig.html#/s:vC9Ma.abstract: Text to search for within components of the location. This value is required to execute an autocomplete request.

Classes/AutocompleteConfig.html#/s:vC9Ma.name: focusPoint
Classes/AutocompleteConfig.html#/s:vC9Ma.abstract: Optional point to order results by where results closer to this value are returned higher in the list.

Classes/AutocompleteConfig.html#/s:FC9Ma.name: init(searchText:focusPoint:completionHandler:)
Classes/AutocompleteConfig.html#/s:FC9Ma.abstract: Initialize an autocomplete config with all the required parameters and a focus point.

Classes/ReverseConfig.html.name: ReverseConfig
Classes/ReverseConfig.html.abstract: Encapsulates request parameters for reverse geo requests.

Classes/MapzenManager.html.name: MapzenManager
Classes/MapzenManager.html.abstract: MapzenManager is a singleton object used for managing state between the various dependencies. Right now, it only manages the API key system.

Classes/RoutingController.html.name: RoutingController
Classes/RoutingController.html.abstract: RoutingController is a subclass of On The Road’s routing controller and is the main access point in the SDK for querying for routes.

Classes/SearchResponse.html.name: SearchResponse
Classes/SearchResponse.html.abstract: Represents a response for a request executed by ‘MapzenSearch’

Classes/MZMapViewController.html.name: MZMapViewController
Classes/MZMapViewController.html.abstract: MZMapViewController is the main class utilized for displaying Mapzen maps on iOS. It aims to provide the full set of features a developer would want for mapping-related tasks, such as displaying routes, results of a search, or the device’s current location (and any combination therein.)

Classes/LocationManager.html.name: LocationManager
Classes/LocationManager.html.abstract: The LocationManager class is a wrapper around iOS’s built in location subsystem. It provides a simpler interface and customization options.

Classes/PeliasMapkitAnnotation.html.name: PeliasMapkitAnnotation
Classes/PeliasMapkitAnnotation.html.abstract: PeliasMapkitAnnotation is a data object class that provides MapKit compatible annotation objects. It conforms to MKAnnotation protocol and is also used by the Mapzen iOS SDK for annotations (markers in Tangram-es).

Classes/MapzenSearch.html.name: MapzenSearch
Classes/MapzenSearch.html.abstract: Main entry point for interacting with Mapzen Search.

Classes/GeoPoint.html.name: GeoPoint
Classes/GeoPoint.html.abstract: Structure used to represent a coordinate point.

Classes/Marker.html.name: Marker
Classes/Marker.html.abstract: Base class for generic markers. Do not instantiate this class directly, use one of the more meaningful subclasses.

Classes/GeometricMarker.html.name: GeometricMarker
Classes/GeometricMarker.html.abstract: Base class for geometric markers. Do not instantiate this class directly, use one of the more meaningful subclasses.
